resources.string: A player always has five available pipes. Each turn they drag a pipe onto the playing area. They can rotate the pipe and put it where they want. If they press connect,the pipe snaps to the nearest grid. If it can\'t connect, a toast is presented saying the move is invalid. A pipe can connect if two flanges meet. Pipes can split and reconnect. There is a cap to close a pipe section. Once connected, the turn ends. If they press discard, the pipe section they were dragging is discarded and the turn ends. Surrender indicates that a player gives up. It should jump to a page that indicates the winner. If player has a completely connected pipe, they press Open Valve to turn on the steam. If there is a leak in their pipe, they lose. If they have successfully connected the source to the destination, they win. Good luck!
